attributes.title: Never downloaded
attributes.review: Makes my phone glitch and I could open my phone. I had to go and fully wipe my phone.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app couldn’t have been worse!😩It was slow and lagging like our president.💩EAT THE RICH!😝Trump wasted his money on this app and as a result it sucked.✋😒 If you support Trump I hope you get better soon! XOXO, all of gen x😜💅

attributes.title: GAVE ME A HEART ATTACK
attributes.review: When I opened this app, annoying orange popped up and gave me a heart attack. I had never seen something so ugly, that I just freaked out. I had to be in the hospital for 4 years. 0/10 do NOT recommend. BLM ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: trash
attributes.review: this app gave my phone a virus and exposed me for selling foot pics. it took my chance of being a full time finger model and put it in the trash. DO NOT DOWNLOAD oh and also i charge 20$ a foot :))

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: this app took ages to download and once it downloaded all it did was glitch I just wanted to have a campaign for my orange goddess 🟠but the app kept crashing and it wouldn’t work DO NOT DOWLOAD!!!!!

attributes.title: lag
attributes.review: as a fellow trump supporter i downloaded this app to support him,  but this app is SO LAGGY that i couldn’t even use it. this has caused me to stop supporting trump. i thought he could do better 😔

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DONT GET
attributes.review: I cannot explain how bad this app made my phone glitch!!! Really? You’d think the president would at least put some effort into making an app that actually works omg 😒

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: i tried downloading this app a month ago and it said i was too fat to have the app downloaded, i tried downloading it again today and it’s took 7 hours to download and as soon as i opened the app and it said it was gonna steal all my data and sell it! it also said it tracks me and knows where i live! the worse app ever

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Nothing worked it would open cut to a black screen and crash

attributes.title: worst app ever💛🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: when I opened the app my whole phone started to glitch very very bad. after a few days of using it I got a virus😫 worst app I have ever downloaded!
